name: BuildingPermitsPhilly
description: New construction permits for the City of Philadelphia
where: permitissuedate > '2007-01-01' AND permitdescription IN ( 'RESIDENTIAL BUILDING PERMIT', 'COMMERCIAL BUILDING PERMIT', 'NEW CONSTRUCTION PERMIT' )

name: ActivityLicensesPhilly
description: Commercial activity licenses for the City of Philadelphia

name: BizLicensesPhilly
description: Business licenses for the City of Philadelphia

name: DeedTransfersPhilly
description: Deed real estate transfers for the City of Philadelphia
